website_summaries.verdict: A cozy, padded booster seat with a sturdy restraint system that small to medium-sized dogs take to almost immediately.
pros: Dogs like the comfortable seat, with most adapting to it quickly
Restraint system holds pets in place and is adjustable
Washable cover is a big plus
cons: Takes up a lot of space on the back seat
Side walls and seat belt connector strap seem flimsy
Harness tether connects to seat belt but not the car seat, so the dog isn’t well secured into the seat

customer_reviews.title: Medium great size for two 8-9 lb. Chihuahuas
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, but I could have gone with one. My Chihuahuas are 8.5 and 9 lbs, and they both fit quite comfortably. The were excited to be looking outside instead of trapped in their kennels. Eventually, they settled down into naps, and they never fought once.
customer_reviews.author: Alan O

customer_reviews.title: My yorkie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7lb yorkie loves her car seat. I'm sure if it was her choice, she would run around the car but that's not happening. She recently had Bilateral Knee Surgery and this came in handy to keep her contained on the way home from the vet. Although my car seat does not look exactly like the one pictured, it works perfectly. I'm not super picky and I did but the cheapest color available. Love it! Included is a picture of my 7lb Yorkie and my sisters 15lb silky. I'm sure if I got an extra seatbelt, they would both fit. I ordered medium.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lacy loves her new Snoozer
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this car seat for Lacy. When the delivery truck came and we were ready to open the box we were not sure how Lacy would react... would she see it as something for her to use as a seat or something to chew up? We removed it from the box, set it on the floor and Lacy immediately jumped into it with a smile... same as the photo in the car. Lacy is comfy, can look out the window and most of all we feel she is safer than when we had her sitting on our lap.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Z.

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star for Quality. Lacking Big Time
customer_reviews.text: This Lookout Car Seat is precious & right size for my 8 lb Maltese. Problem is the Foam Rubber that easily looses shape hence liner sags. This photo was taken the day it arrived. Shippers stuffed in box & the front lip for doggies face is mushy & liner now sags there. I found it is glued on inside so to remove & wash means lumpy sags will be the effect from then on. For the price I just expected better quality. Sorry. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: The safety strap clips to his harness and I feel he's pretty secure if there's a fender bender
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 lb chihuahua just got to try it out on a weekend trip. He had plenty of room to stretch out in a number of positions. I put it in the back seat behind the driver. The safety strap clips to his harness and I feel he's pretty secure if there's a fender bender. He's up high enough to see out the side window which he loves. The fabric wipes clean easily and also removes easily for washing. Unlike other seats I've purchased this one is very easy to seat belt in place and easy to move. All in all a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a year at most
customer_reviews.text: Liked it at a first. But within a year of moderate use (twice per week for a short trip and maybe 4 longer road trips) the thing has totally fallen apart and unusable. The base is actually coming apart into different pieces so it’s no longer comfortable. I paid too much for this for it to not have a longer life. Also the cover loses fluff all over the car all the time which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: Medium was a perfect size for my Boston terrier.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing in my cart for quite some time. I was kind of hesitant to buy it because I wasn’t sure how my dog would like it. My dog loves to ride in the car and this was perfect for her to sit down and still be able to see out of the window. This is her space now in the car and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money for a piece of foam covered in fabric
customer_reviews.text: It would be -2 stars if that were possible, I paid $90 plus tax for a piece of foam, covered in fabric that wasn't even closed on the bottom? Then when I wanted to return it I had to pay $15 for the return, which apparently is the slowest possible way to return it...then it takes 5-7 business days for the refund? Really? Didn't take that long for the money to come out of my account. Do understand the processing thing, I work in a finance department, but since you know it's coming back the processing should already be started...or do you have so many coming back that you are back logged?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Spencer

customer_reviews.title: very unstable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. however, it did not fit in my SUV back seat stably. once secured with seatbelt, it had a lot of forward movement despite tightening the belt, and interfered with the door closing. I suspect in a crash the seat would go flying. its also quite shallow.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this to other with small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog Munch absolutely loves this car seat..He got right in and snuggled down..It fits very securely in front seat of my car, just make sure you extend the seat belt and let it retract so it keeps the car seat really tight to the seat of the car..I would definitely recommend this to other with small dogs. Munch is 6 llbs, I'm not sure how comfortable a much larger dog would be. The attachment for his harness is good but for long trips I would suggest the Snoozer safety harness and seat belt extension.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Pillow Stuffing Questionable?
customer_reviews.text: The car seat works well for a small dog who likes to watch the world go by during her travels. However I really question the stuffing used inside the removable pillow. It looks like a bunch of cut up foam garbage and I wonder about toxicity. I replaced this interior pillow with an old down one I had and am now very happy with the product. Also I would recommend putting a pillow case over the micro suede pillow cover for easy laundering as the light color will get dirty almost immediately. The micro suede does launder well however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with quality of this item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with quality of this item for the price. Removable quilted cover is held on by elastic on the bottom leaving exposed foam. I thought it would at least be zippered on. Didn't want exposed foam on my leather seats. Will be returning this item. Very disappointed because I loved the concept of my Gracie being able to see out. Will keep looking!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Bryde

customer_reviews.title: No more car sickness
customer_reviews.text: First off, love the pink color! My little Maltese was having a real problem traveling. My breeder told me to hold her so she could see out the window. Fine, but I'm driving! The day this came, we headed out on a 3 hour drive. No drooling, no sickness, she sat and watched out the window. Now she will lay down and go to sleep; but this thing made our life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Stancik

customer_reviews.title: Too soft to provide protection in a car & too large for all but the largest cats. Maybe would fit larger dog, but still too soft
customer_reviews.text: Too soft to be safe and too short for cat to see outside. I ordered mistake of ordering a large size, given the choices available. The manufacturer or Amazon or both should offer an intermediate size. I did not understand from the specifications that this size was clearly too large for my cat and hoped the seat would be an acceptable size. Not so — way too large. I seem to recall that the manufacturer offered this only for small dogs, but many small dogs weigh the same 10-12 lbs. as my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Levy

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but we'll worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 pound Maltese, she loves it, but mostly enjoys standing up to look out of the passenger window. Important to use the safety harness strap because if you should stop short your pet will fall into the dashboard. I would definitely recommend this if your pet enjoys looking out the window, although I did have to place an additional pillow on top of the one provided because it wasn't high enough for her to see out of if she was lying or sitting down. A great alternative to your pup sitting on your lap while you drive like my Maltese would often love to do.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My bichon loves it! He can see me in the driver's seat, can look outside and also do his favorite activity in the car....snoozing! Very happy he's safe and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: First Time Buy
customer_reviews.text: First time buy of this product and I love it! I bought the small for my 16lb 8mo old Boston Terrier. I had a different booster seat before and he didn't fit well in it and with this one he fits and isn't falling out as I'm driving. I have a chevy sonic and it fits on the seat. I love that all you have to do is buckle the seat to the car seat, way easier system!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Life it too short not to pamper your fur children
customer_reviews.text: I regret not buying this sooner!! My husband was like "no we don't need a dog booster seat" for the longest time. Eventually I didn;t listen and purchased anyways. GLAD I DID. Our little girl was always struggling to see out the window and now she is living the dream! Shes 16lbs and an old lady and she loves the sun hitting her face and the wind in her old gray hair. Life it too short not to pamper your fur children :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R

customer_reviews.title: Do yo have deeper seats?
customer_reviews.text: I feel ridiculous that l did not contact you sooner. I realized right after putting my pup in it that it was not going to work. It’s just not deep enough and he won’t stay put. It’s in brand new condition because l was never able to use it. I understand it’s my fault for being a couple days past the return date. Sincerely, Ruth Huyler
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Huyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, one for each of our dogs. Our youngest dog was having trouble with motion sickness and this seems to have helped with this problem. The dogs are able to sit in their seats and look out the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product High Price
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and it is a very nice size but should not be used in a front seat as it exposes them to the dangers of the airbag if your seat has a detection device and senses enough weight to deploy the bag and an accident. The product itself if 5 star but it is excessively pricey considering what it is and the mark-up must be astronomical. Still, I love it and so do the dogs... You decide if you want to throw out that much cash!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Booster Seat, however...
customer_reviews.text: ...my dog won't use it at all. She is 5-yrs old, about 30-lbs, and a Rat Terrier. Unfortunately, since she was a baby she has always ridden in my lap. I recently bought a new car, manual trans...so the lap-riding just doesn't work anymore. 'Thought she would adapt to riding in the Booster Seat, but no-dice. It really is a nicely-made seat, plenty large for a 30-lb 'Rattie'. If anyone could make good use of it, I'd be open to selling it to them at a good discount; I notice that Amazon doesn't have any of this size and upholstery combination (Black quilted exterior, Ivory fleece interior) anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier CheeseHead

customer_reviews.title: My dog didn’t seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this elevated my dog so he could see out the window, but he never really looked out. When he sits on the regular car seat he would get up and look out the window constantly, but in the booster seat he most lay there looking at me, and seemed to actively avoid looking outside. Not sure if he got car sick up there? Plus, even using the security strap, I felt that he was at more risk of injury in the event of an accident at the higher position because if he was flung out of the seat, the security belt seemed like it could choke him. I’m not sure on that, but that’s my impression.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dachshund in love with new seat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister's mini dachshund. Both of them love it! Henry (Wadsworth Longfellow) was so happy he howled when he got in his new seat!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love it!. I recently adopted a Yorkie. He is very little , he is 10 pounds. I wanted to have a seat where he could be able to see me and see everything around outside the car. This seat is perfect , is bigger for him but it makes it more comfortable. I like it also because it comes with a strap that you can tied it with the seat belt and the vest. Is very light very well done ,sturdy and easy to clean you can take it off and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana J

customer_reviews.title: Tether is not safe for my Yorkipoo or any other dog. Ineffective design.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased six months ago for express purpose of Safety for my 10 lb dog. However, the tether comes free a couple times a week so he could easily fly through the windshield in an accident or even fender bender. The tether clasp is very Cheap and the design of its attachment to the seatbelt is not safe either. China made but US Pricing. I'm Extremely Disappointed in this product for the cost does not equal safety benefit value. Had I known this, I would have purchased something else. Only good thing was the height kept my boy from being carsick. High price to pay for that.
customer_reviews.author: Vessa

customer_reviews.title: Shih Tzu Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 month Shih Tzu puppy and she absolutely loves it! She cuddled up right away in the corner. When we stopped the car she put her little front paws up on the side to see out. She has not once tried to get out. The seat is too big for her now but we wanted her to get used to it while young. This booster is very well made and sits higher than some you see, serving it's purpose well. It was a great purchase and one we will use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Shedan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely sits up high so my girl can see out the window!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat for my sweet girl. She's about 14.5 pounds and the small seat was perfect size for her. I knew the only way getting her to use the car seat successfully would be if she could see out the window. It was very easy to install. I had not used a harness before, so had to purchase that separately because it would have been too dangerous to latch her in with just a collar. We've made several short trips and though she would prefer to sit in my lap, this is a much safer option for both of us! She is getting used to it and I think will be fine with it in time.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Randolph

customer_reviews.title: This is the pet seat i settled on,  really nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I tried several other ones before I actually settled on this particular one. it's extremely light weight and it actually is tall enough my dog can see out the windows but she feels safe in it . And it's very easy to attach you just wrap your seat belt around it and the leash part for her you wrap it around the seat belt as also and then snap it to her harness. I will try to add some pictures on here for you in reference my dog is a 29 pound pug.
customer_reviews.author: donna maybe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the Snoozer! I've purchased 5 of them over the years, for my mini dachshund and for gifts. It's made well, the cover is washable and it's the perfect height, even in the bucket seat of my low 2-seater. She can see out perfectly. Buy it, your fur baby will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - worth the value!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I reviewed this product? We have purchased 3 of these car seats and we recommend them to all our friends and family. We have traveled across the US and our fur-babies stay safe and sleep well on the road. The car seat sits high so your pet gets air and has a great view. Product was packaged well and shipped quickly. This dog car seat was purchased for my Son's French Bulldog (our Granddoggie) and she loves it! It's worth the investment for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: River 1

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My shi tzu mix loves it. She’s comfortable and likes looking out the window. It seems secure. It was a little big for my passenger seat, but worked. I’m a little concerned about it holding up long term. I have a new puppy so thought the expense worth 15 years of use. I’ve had it about a month and the foam on one side seams like it’s bending a little. Time will tell. I hope I’m wrong and this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 lb chihuahua who comes with me basically everywhere. He loves looking out the window and he would climb all over me while I drove and it was just not safe. This seat is amazing!!!! I was worried he wouldn't be able to look out because he's so small and I have a large SUV, but it's high enough. I also love that it's made out of high density foam... I considered harder/plastic options but this feels much safer and comfortable for him. I only wish I had spent a little extra $$ and gone for the "lux" version :) 10/10 would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: sof

customer_reviews.title: Changed our time together - for the better!
customer_reviews.text: My girl DeeDee was not happy in the car until she had this car seat. It elevated her to see outside with the security of being held in place by the sides and back of the seat, which were anchored in the car easily with the seat belt. We often used it as a bed when we spent the nights away from home (we had other beds, but she would not settle down until she had her car seat). Without a doubt, this was the best investment I made for her. It changed our trips by giving her a sense of comfort and safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this car seat. At first I ordered the small but found it didn't quite fill the vehicle car seat to the door so when my dog put her feet on the edge to look out the window, the edge of the car seat would fold over. Though she was secure with the seat belt, (the strap that comes with the pet car seat which you attach to the seat belt and dog's harness), it wasn't much fun for her if she couldn't look out the window. So I returned it for the medium which is perfect. I've washed it once so far and it washed well and was fairly easy to take the cover on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 21 lb minature schnauzer perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a pet seat my dog likes. I had tried the hang over the headrest type and she hated it and it took a lot of adjusting to find the right height. The pictures attached show her in the front seat of my VW Jetta, plenty of room for the seat and for her. Very easy to install, straight out of the shipping box and into the car. She is very comfortable in it and can lay down and sleep if she wants. It has a strap to attach to her harness for extra safety. I highly recommend this if you have to do any traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Reiner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat. My dog can see out without me having to put her car seat on top of 2 pillows that slide around. She likes to hang over the side with her front legs, and it doesn’t collapse. (Yet) The strap keeps her secure. She seems very happy in it. I did put a towel under it, and a towel in it, just to make it easy to wash up. But so far she has not upchucked. She is a 14 lb dachshund mix, and the small size is fine for her, though I would get the larger size for a long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: My small dog loves this! She sits high enough that she can see out the window, and big enough that she can poke her head out of the window (some seats sit too far from the window). I put the restraint on the shoulder belt so she can move around and still be safe. You may find that you have to not put the window down all the way to keep the dog from trying to climb out of the window. Since getting this seat, I have acquired another small dog and tried other seats and restraints without success, so I'm ordering another one of these for dog two.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Our Pug loves his plush seat!
customer_reviews.text: Our Pug is 18 pounds and has plenty of room to lay down and turn around. He really loves looking out of the windows and the seat is high enough so that he can enjoy the view. The seat is easy to install and very plush. One complaint, the tether that goes around the seat belt slides so the dog can move along the length of the seat belt. If we are not careful when opening the door, he can jump and the tether slides through the opening for the seat belt and he can come out of the seat. Wish there was a better solution for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog booster seat
customer_reviews.text: My pupperoni loves this booster seat! Before purchasing it, she would jump between the front seat and back while the vehicle was moving (not very safe). With this booster seat, her harness is clipped in to the seatbelt (I used a carabiner instead of the lobster clip provided) and she happily sits in the seat and watches the world zoom by. For size reference: my dog is a Boston terrier mutt, approximately 26 lbs. this seat isn’t big enough for her to stretch out in, but it’s comfortable for sitting, or laying leaned up against the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and expensive - made in China
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The seller's own website shows this product as custom made and hand sewn in America. There is nothing custom about it, and it is made in China. It's a rip-off at $90 for the medium size. It doesn't even look like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: pots88

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small cars
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something bigger than our Yorkie Poo's Devoted Doggy Booster Car Seat. The Snoozer Lookout Car Seat is a nice and looks like it would be very comfortable but it was too big for either of our cars, a Fiesta ST and a Miata. We had to return it. We'll keep looking for something that gives our Oscar enough space to move around while keeping him safe and still able to look out the window. Wish this seat was just a little smaller for compact cars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my boys love riding around in like they're the kings of the car
customer_reviews.text: They're HUGE!!!! I have 2 small Tibetan Spaniels, they're 13 and 12 years old. I wanted them to be comfortable and safe and these car seats make me feel much better! I ordered medium because I wanted to make sure they had plenty of room, medium was overkill, but I'm not mad about it! I'm stationed overseas and have my boys with me, I drive around a lot of winding country/mountain roads and my boys are no longer sliding around on the back seat. I do wish they had side pockets or a snap-able strap (for flexi-leash handles) to hold leases and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Semaj

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this type of seat for many years and love them .... and please use a harness
customer_reviews.text: All my Jack Russells have loved them. Just wrap and lock in with a seatbelt and loop the tether around the seat belt attaching the latch end to your dogs harness. One note, I was appalled at how many reviewers mentioned attaching their dogs to car seats using a collar - never ever use anything but a harness when putting your dog in any model car seat- otherwise you are basically taking the chance that they will be lynched if you stop the car suddenly or are in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat for dogs !!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat I purchased for my little furry pup was just what I (and he) were looking for! The booster helps my little Kiko look out all the windows, which helps keep him from getting car sick, while at the same time keeping him safely secured in his car seat. It’s easy to install with the click of a seat belt!! The soft exterior fabric doesn’t ruin my leather seats and the inside of the seat is cozy, fluffy and plush! I would definitely recommended this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I bought two for my (crazy
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this seat. Not only is it comfy. But i can secure it. And it brings him up to the level of the window so he is not jumping all around to try to look out! Great product! I bought two for my (crazy, high energy) Jack Russell's and they love it! Even my over grown Black Lab wanted to sit in it! lol see pic
customer_reviews.author: August Brotzman

customer_reviews.title: No more motion sickness.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an upcoming 13 hour care ride. This seat was easy to install and seemed to hold my dog securely. One of the reasons we chose this car seat is it raises the dog up so they can see out the window and cuts down on motion sickness. I can happily report that this was the first timey dog has taken a car ride without vomiting. She made it 26 hours (13 hours each way) and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Secure Travel in Style
customer_reviews.text: Dakota 'used' to get car sick. But ever since she's been riding in her Lookout car seat we've had no more oops-ups in the car! I get asked by people all the time about this seat and where did I buy it. I like that she's restrained in place in the car, much safer. She's also quite the hit when we're in traffic, her cute little face looking out the window while she's securely anchored in her seat, always brings a smile to people's faces. A very useful product if you travel with your fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAHTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love these car seats
customer_reviews.text: I love these car seats! This is the 2nd one I purchased for our 2nd dog, and she absolutely loves it. She's very small - no more than 10 pounds - but she loves to curl up and go to sleep in the car. And when she loves sitting up and looking out the window when she's up. If I have any complaints, it's that I wish the clip they offer with these seats was a little longer. It barely gives my dogs room to turn around in the seat. I wound up running a thin leash through the harness and securing it to the headrest in order to keep them safe. Otherwise, I highly recommend these car seats!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this seat
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog that loves to look out the window when taken for a drive. This elevates her enough for her to do that. She also seems to feel more secure in it than loose on the car seat. It is kept firmly in place by using the seat belt to hold it down into position. With normal stops and turns they are quite secure in the seat but if you need to slam on the brakes your dog will be thrown forward. There is nothing included with this car seat that will hold them down. You will need to buy additional items for that.
customer_reviews.author: janglin28

customer_reviews.title: Needs different attachment
customer_reviews.text: We used to have the Snoozer for the front console, which we loved for 8 years, but it won't fit our new vehicle. This one is very well made and my pup loves being elevated in the back. However, when we buckled it in with the seatbelt as shown, it slid around on the seat. I wasn't convinced in an accident, it would protect my precious cargo. Instead, we used two bungee cords. They hook into the seatbelt loops. We fastened them with the hooks going in opposite directions through the loops for added protection. It's east to get in and out, put it in another vehicle, and they hold her seat perfectly tight and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Very happy doggie
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat., it fits perfectly on the seat of my Sonata. I feel safe knowing the seat belt holds it in place very tightly. My three pound Yorkie first got used to it by jumping in and out and also relaxing in the seat, while it sat in our living room for few days. By the time I put it in the car....he felt comfortable on our first drive. Even napped a bit ! I chose the silver/grey that matches the interior of my car beautifully. P.S. I hook my little guy in his seat by his harness and not his collar., the recommended way.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: We had to change how it is buckled into the seat. It was difficult to do, and it was not exactly secure. Using their seatbelt, we made it smaller and are using our own clip. Our little 6-pound dog was getting car sick until we put her in this carseat. It is tall, so now she can see out. She is no longer sick or whining. She loves to go on drives with us now!
customer_reviews.author: White Haired Lady

customer_reviews.title: High & cozy
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was a bit pricey, but it’s just what I needed for my 18 lb. mixed breed doggie. He can see out the window real well when sitting up or curl up and go to sleep in the soft fluffy liner. I’m glad I purchased this, especially for longer road trips.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Liner needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is a very firm foam with nylon quilting. The fur lining is rather thin to the point you can see the base fabric. My dog would dig around it to get comfortable and cause fur balls. Safety-wise, I’m sure it’s good but the company didn’t have to cheap out on the “fleece”. You can always use a blanket. I purchased a medium for my 10 lb. Chihuahua and he can lie flat sideways.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: My ShihTzu loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it because my ShihTzu can see out and he is strapped in and safe. I was in a car accident before Christmas where a car turned in front of me - Sammy was in front seat and fortunately toppled to the floor or else the air bags would have killed him. Both cars were totaled and I will never put a pet in front seat again. After this accident is when I looked into the Snoozer Lookout seat. I'm very happy with it. Sammy has adjusted to sitting in back, strapped in his seat and enjoying the view. He's not going back and forth in the seats and not distracting me while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Car Seat You Could Ever Buy! It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for our 25lb Frenchie. We travel a lot and he was never still during car rides - primarily because he was too short to see out of the windows. This dog seat solves it all- it elevates him to window height, is sturdy so he feels secure, has high edges to serve as a place for his chin and the inside is so soft he loves being in it- even in the house!! My cousin had the same issues with her Lasso but once in this car seat- success. It’s magic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb L

customer_reviews.title: The perfect product for pet travel
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for us. My dog loves this thing and doesn't roam around the car. She's a 14lb. min pin mix and it fits her perfectly with space for her to lay down. It sits up high enough that she can easily see out the back windows of our Chevy Volt (in a bucket seat btw). It's comfy, easy to vacuum, and my dogs adores it. When we bring it inside so we can get the car cleaned she jumps in right away and takes a nap. Yes, it's expensive and yes, it's bulky but I'm telling you - it's SO worth it. I'm sure this won't be the last one we buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte-ann Riffey

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I ever made!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough GREAT things about this car seat! I started fostering dogs a few months ago and someone suggested I try it. I was a little skeptical & hesitant to spend my money on it initially, but it’s been worth every single penny and then some! I’ve included pix of a couple different foster dogs who rode beautifully in this car seat but we’re horribly anxious in a soft carrier. I’m in Texas and it’s HOT outside but sitting up so tall they get the AC blowing thru their fur and they all love looking out the window! It soothes their anxiety & mine! Super easy to attach to their harness and the seatbelt. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MartiniLover

customer_reviews.title: Dog feels secure.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new miniature schnauzer. It took a little for him to be comfortable but now he gets in and either sits up to look around or lays down to take a nap. He appears to feel secure in the Snoozer. It seemed so big when he was smaller buI t now he fits fine. I hope he doesn't get much bigger! One thing, I wish the liner was removable and washable. Early on he got a little carsick and it was a tough clean. Got it done but... I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KingRam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad i bought this! We are always traveling with our 10 lbs maltese. Sometimes we have to take her on road trips that our 10 hours long. Before we bought hhe snoozer she would sit on the passengers lap but would want to climb in the drivers lap which is not safe at all. We took her on a test drive this afternoon and she didnt mind it one bit! I thought she wouldnt like it since she is always in our laps but she was so content. It's definitely high enough for her to see out the window too. So glad i bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as specified in write up of the dog car seat.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were a little skeptical at first, because we weren't sure our dog would sit in the seat. Our dog, when a puppy, sat in the front seat, so we were a little apprehensive about putting him in the back seat. But, I have to say, he looks so comfortable in the seat and really seems to like it. He is a Schichon and it fits him perfectly, with extra room to spare. The seat is very easy to install and it has a safety strap to hook to your dogs harness.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Storozuk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bed for my Yorkie!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 lb. Yorkie loves it. Great for traveling as he can see out the window without jumping around or me having to elevate him enough to be able to see out. (My invention didn't work so well.) Great product! I use a different restraint that attaches to the shoulder part of the seat belt and then clips onto his harness. It's more secure for him and stays securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Made well and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice in car, the only thing I don’t like is the material is very warm for Florida’s it’s so hot here and wish it was reversible for summer and winter. I bought a cooling matt from Amazon to put on the bottom so our little guy could be cooler in the summer heat. And I do like that he can sit up higher to see out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baumann

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE their Lookout seats!! The large is very big, much too big for my 26-lb dog (could hold 2 of him), but it works! I also bought the medium size for my smaller 15-lb dog and it is plenty big for either! The dogs can see out the window, and usually just lie in their Snoozer and watch the world go by. Although I secure the Snoozer Lookout with the car's seatbelt as directed, I do NOT use the collar attachment to secure my dog (not safe enough in my opinion); my dogs wear crash-tested harnesses which are then secured to the child safety-seat LATCH tethers
customer_reviews.author: Darla O

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a high anxiety dog that we take to Florida. He wants to sit on my lap or under my feet. I bought this to keep him in back seat while we travel. Have taken him for a ride every day to adlimate him. At first he whined but the strap kept him in. Once he saw he could be high and look out the window, he settled down. Now he just jumps into it and loves riding in the car! Sorry I waited so long to get this.
customer_reviews.author: kathy brothers

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat so far. I took it out of the box and right away my dog jumped in and fell asleep. I didnt know what size to get for him. 10 pound yorkie but he is tiny and the small was perfect. I'm thinking about ordering another to keep in the house for him just to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: StefTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought these years ago
customer_reviews.text: Going to make my life so much easier, and will keep my dogs happy and safe too. The seat is a solid foam cushion with an elasticized, washable top. It is easy, SO EASY to belt into the car. The restraining strap easily hooked onto my dogs' harnesses. I have a chihuahua, 5 lbs, 8 inches high) and a chiggie (7 lbs, 9 inches high). The seats are 8" tall and give both dogs enough lift to be able to see easily out of the side windows. (NOTE: I washed the covers because when I belted one into my cars to try it out, it left black smudges on the seats.)
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on buying this or making my own. My husband talked me into it, and it was worth every penny. My 25 pound Boston terrier did fantastic with this. I used her usual harness, hooked the strap around the seatbelt, and she stayed in it. Trust me when you put the seatbelt through the groove in the back, this thing won't move. I ordered the medium and it fits her well. We are taking an 8 hr road trip up into the Colorado mountains which is why I wanted this. We use it all around town now. She loves being able to look out. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lbl

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Product cover was shedding, my dog kept wanting to eat the fuzz when I put her in it. The seat was extremely large. Not as I expected. Too expensive for quality of product. Bottom was not level at all.
customer_reviews.author: Charline Greer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My Shorkie pup loves it! He can see out the window and it’s soft enough to snuggle in and sleep. Also, he is very long, so it fit him well. Keep in mind, it’s ginormous and barely fits in the seat! I do wish it was a little bit smaller. Also, the security leash seems a little short & my pup can’t really turn around. It’s probably for safety, but I still added a short extension strap.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLoo

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This pet seat is the bomb. I have 2 of them and took my dogs out yesterday for the first time. After putting one dog back in her seat as she was trying to get in her sisters, they got the concept. One of them just loved being able to look out the windows. I would certainly recommend this pet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and safe!
customer_reviews.text: I already have two of these for my pugs. Just adopted a Frenchie pup, and she needs boosting to see out the window! I like this car seat the best because it's hard foam under the soft cover so no hard edges. The seatbelt strap goes across the back of it, so nothing for the pup to get caught on. Cover comes off for washing - I wash it in gentle, but can be tricky to figure out how to get it back on. I used a permanent marker and noted with an arrow on the bottom where the cover tag should be!
customer_reviews.author: Dezz

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dog seat. I wanted this to hold on my lap because that’s the only place my dog will sit. But it’s too big for that. Beware if you buy this. Your only choice of return is thru UPS. I usually take returns to an Amazon drop off. It is costing me $16.97 to return it! My fault, I usually won’t buy anything if the returns are not free.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Shea

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for quality of materials used to construct
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this was very easy to install. My dog actually became more nervous sitting in it because it is so elevated. It's very lightweight and was constructed with very cheap materials -- likely made in China. I'd be highly surprised if it was constructed in the USA and the materials are made in USA. I bought the $89.99 version and when I returned it had to pay a $15 return shipping fee. Not exactly a Prime product. Not worth the cost.l
customer_reviews.author: Boomer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wish they could do more on the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because my dog likes it and actually would stay in it while I’m driving so I guess that’s all what matters. So 4 stars for the idea, the look, and to support someone that did put thoughts and turned an idea into a product that works. I wish I could give it perfect 5 stars but to be honest the quality especially the material is 2/10. Sorry I want to support the business but I want to be honest about how I feel about the product too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a seat for both my Yorkie and Dachshund to share, this fit the bill and now both can comfortably ride while being able to look out the window. It was larger than I thought but did fit in my Hyundai Tucson front seat well. My only complaint is I needed to find an additional clip for the harness, other than that - it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bourbon Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best for dogs up to 20 lbs, larger dogs would be at the ceiling of your car, as it's very tall.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Very good cushioning, obviously a good product. I think it sits the dog up a little too high though. I think if it were about 4 inches lower it would be perfect. You do have to be mindful of not putting it in the front seat because it would be right in front of the airbag, which if came out could seriously injure or kill your dog. I recommend putting it in the back. It attaches very easily to the seatbelt, and then the strap has a very substantial clip to attach to your dogs harness....NOT IT"S COLLAR!!
customer_reviews.author: EAGLE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 small dogs who love looking out the window during our car rides. They used to try to sit on my lap or stand up to see through the window which made it dangerous to drive. I bought one small and one large Snoozer and they fit side by side in the back seat. Now all 4 can pick a place and see safely (and remain still) during our outings. The extra harness to seatbelt clasps work well too! They are also very plush and comfy for when they just want to sleep back there!! Thank you for such an invention!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HATED IT!  DOGS IN DANGER OF DEATH!!  WAY TOO PRICEY!
customer_reviews.text: The intention of the pet being higher was why I bought this, however my dog almost choked after trying to get out and hanging over the edge. Imagine if I had to run into a gas station to pay for gas to come out to find a dead dog. Concept is great, implementation and price were way off. I got a different one that is lower, but has a shorter leash - totally safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Signforu

customer_reviews.title: Sitting pretty
customer_reviews.text: Here's a pic of a friend's dog that didn't want to leave my dogs car seat. I put a sheet over it for the summer to keep her cool because it comes with a heavy fleece cover. Much to hot for the summer. My little dog loves it because it's high enough for her to see out the window. The only thing wrong is that it doesn't have a slot to tie the dog down but she loves it and so does her friend lol
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great booster!
customer_reviews.text: Though a little pricey, this has been incredibly valuable for our 25 lb. 3 legged terrier mix. It stabilizes him in the back seat and gives him great ability to experience outside smells without having to lower the window almost all the way. He like it so much, we let him sleep in it in the house for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: Biff approved car seat!
customer_reviews.text: We own one of these car seats and just ordered another so we do not have to move the seat between vehicles. When we got our puppy Biff, we wanted him to go with us and be safe. He loves being able to see out the window. He knows when the vehicle door opens he happily climbs in his seat and waits to be strapped in. There is plenty of room for him to lay down and nap.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Molly approves!
customer_reviews.text: Molly, my 18 pound JRT mix, loves going for a ride in her booster seat! Bought a medium and fits her perfect. Raises her up 7-8 inches. She likes to sit but can also see over the dash board when lying down. Your dog needs to wear a harness. They don't show it in the picture but there is a strap that feeds through the lap belt. The strap has a clip which attaches to the rings on your dogs harness. Very secure should you have to hit the brakes hard. The fabric has elastic around the bottom so the cover can easily be removed and put in the wash. Good quality fabric. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MadcitySusie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but sheds and a bit too wide
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a road trip. It is a quality product, but know that the plush top sheds a lot. We solved this for our trip by putting a sheet over it. One other thing to keep in mind, the medium size which our shih tzu fit in perfectly, does take up a lot of space...It's wider than a bucket seat. If it was a bit narrower, it still would have worked for her. I think small would have been too small. I think the product would be greatly improved by addressing the shedding issue and making it a little narrower. We ended up putting it in the trunk for the trip back.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: SIMPLY THE BEST! Our 13lbs Bodhi (Mini Pinscher - Dachsund) is so comfortable on this car seat. He used to be very fidgety on car rides... not anymore! He is just loving every moment. This is the best purchase you can make for your beloved pups. It keeps them safely buckled and adequately elevated for a pleasurable car ride. I would give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The car seat was nice and well made but it would wobble in the car even when the dog did not move. Therefore, I returned it and got the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is sturdy and attractive. We have a Cocker Spaniel that weighs about 22 lbs and a Papillon that weights about 10 lbs. We bought the first seat for our Spaniel and it works great. When we got the Papillon and needed a seat for her we decided to buy the same one. Both dogs can see out very well even when lying down and the seat is very roomy for the Spaniel. We probably could have put them both in the same seat, but for long trips separate seats is probably best.
customer_reviews.author: T J Coker

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves his car seat
customer_reviews.text: My dog Fin is 21lbs and he loves his car seat. (We have MEDIUM In gray.)He jumped right in the minute I took it out of the box. He really feels safe in the car now and he can see out the window. When he hears keys jangle he looks at the door and cries because he likes the car so much now. The seat is a little wider than the back bucket seat in my Town & Country van but it's rigid enough on the bottom that it works out
customer_reviews.author: The room is never done

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the quality and description does not match
customer_reviews.text: The fur part is not soft AT ALL. Also, it is not the same as the one in the picture. I bought the size medium and it didn’t have the little plastic box that shows in the pictures. Unfortunately I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mas NY

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat to use in the car so my fourteen pound terrier mix could see out. It has helped a lot with his anxiety, although it also takes a Tundershirt to keep him calm. Very easy to install and remove when needed. I recently had to take it out to make room for people and set it down in the den. Lo and behold, he climbed into it there and was in heaven. So much so that I just ordered a second one for use in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Olga The Cat

customer_reviews.title: Louie approves!
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely bigger than what I was expecting but it works great it the backseat. 17lb pug terrier pup LOVES it. It comes with the strap to clip to his harness. He can see out the window and he can lay down with PLENTY of room so stretch out and be comfortable. Cover comes off for washing, also. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Safe and mini doxie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Safe for my tiny 7.5 lb doxie and she loves it! Jumped right in while it was in the living room ... can see out the window or lay down and relax. When I visit family or friends, we take this in with us because she is trained to go to her dog bed when I say "climb" and she jumps right in and stays - treats it just like a bed!
customer_reviews.author: JWay

customer_reviews.title: Puppers Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this seat. She is a 9 pound Chihuahua, so I can’t say how much weight this will actually hold. But, she can move around, and lay down and see over the dashboard of my full-size pick-up. It’s a much more secure way of having her in the truck with me. It also gives her better access to the open window, which I can keep only partially open now so she can smell out the window, but can’t get out. The included seatbelt attachment is a nice addition and I feel better knowing she’s really secure in her seat.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: So happy we bought this
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the Snoozer, I wasn't sure what to expect, but when I unwrapped it & but it down our little Taffy jumped right in. We used it on a 400 mile trip and she stayed in it. Most of the time she slept. It was very comforting to know that she wasn't moving back and forth between the front and back seat or seating in our laps. When we open the car door, she knows to go to her new seat. She jumps right in. So happy we bought this. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase. We first bought one years ago and it has held up well. Good quality and our dog loves it. We keep it in the house as a dog bed, and put it in the car when needed. Unless your dog is under 15 - 20 pounds, get the medium. Our dog is 20 pounds and the medium is a good size. If your dog is over about 25 - 30 pounds, get the large or a different seat.
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: BEST Dog Car Seat you can invest in for your pooch!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves her car rides because of her snoozer look out!! worth every penny! I also have to add this is my 3rd time to purchase one. I had one for another dog I had that passed (then gave that one to my mom for her dog). Then my roommate had a small dog that I helped with so I bought one for us to use between our cars for their dog. Now I bought this one for my own dog for my car. BEST car seat for a dog so they can see out yet be safe and comfortable even on long drives
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua used to be very nervous riding in the car, but he loves his booster seat. The real test was travelling from Florida to Massachussett, a long 2-day trip and he just calmed down and slept in his seat most of the way. I can't say that he would have been protected during an accident in that seat, but he was comfortable enough that it made the trip possible.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G.

customer_reviews.title: my maltipoo hated the car
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has been a blessing!!!! Before getting the seat, my maltipoo hated the car. He would get sick, shake and drool even on short trips. He loves his car seat, and now loves going in the car!!! This seat lifts him high enough so that he can look out the window, which I believe was the problem with the carsickness. I bought this 3 years ago, and it looks like brand new. The cover is washable, and the foam construction, couple with the included harness makes it the safest place for your dog to be in the event of an accident. I recommend using a harness on the dog rather than a collar when using the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy9152

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it, she’s safer, and no more dirty car window !
customer_reviews.text: No more dog jumping around trying to see out the window. My dog now gets a birds eye view of everything, and she stays calm and relaxed as she enjoys her rides in the car since I purchased and installed this in the back seat of my car. Not to complicated to seatbelt it in and comes with a strap to hook to her harness so she’s also safe from falling out or trying to get out. Much safer then her jumping around trying to see out the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.
